Sentencas: The phase evolution and electrical conductivity of strontium-doped gadolinium aluminate (GdAlO3) based perovskite oxides were investigated.
Titulo: Phase evolution and conductivity study of doped gadolinium-based perovskite oxides

Sentencas: The strontium-doped compositions of GdAlO3 were prepared through the citrate gel process.
Titulo: Phase evolution and conductivity study of doped gadolinium-based perovskite oxides

Sentencas: Analyses of the phases in the Gd1-xSrxAlO3-delta system were carried out using X-ray diffraction.
Titulo: Phase evolution and conductivity study of doped gadolinium-based perovskite oxides

Sentencas: The morphology of the calcined powders was studied through scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Phase evolution and conductivity study of doped gadolinium-based perovskite oxides

Sentencas: The strontium-doped GdAlO3 powders obtained after calcination at 1000 degrees C was found to be porous agglomerate composed of nanocrystalline grains.
Titulo: Phase evolution and conductivity study of doped gadolinium-based perovskite oxides

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of Gd1-xSrxAlO3-delta (x = 0.02-0.14) was measured using ac impedance spectroscopy as a function of temperature ranging from 300 to 1000 degrees C under air.
Titulo: Phase evolution and conductivity study of doped gadolinium-based perovskite oxides

Sentencas: The solid solubility of strontium in GdAlO3 was found to be around 8 mol%.
Titulo: Phase evolution and conductivity study of doped gadolinium-based perovskite oxides

Sentencas: The undissolved strontium precipitated in the form of SrGd2Al2O7 phase.
Titulo: Phase evolution and conductivity study of doped gadolinium-based perovskite oxides

Sentencas: The total electrical conductivity of Sr-doped GdAlO3 increased with increasing amounts of strontium up to 6 mol% doping.
Titulo: Phase evolution and conductivity study of doped gadolinium-based perovskite oxides
